Package com.example.eventapp.viewmodels

Class EventsViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.eventapp.viewmodels.EventsViewModel
public class EventsViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
The EventsViewModel class is responsible for managing and organizing event-related data and operations for the associated view in a structured MVVM pattern. This view model communicates with repositories to perform CRUD operations on events, handle user signups, and track events the user is organizing or attending. It also manages the status and permissions of the current user in relation to events.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventsViewModel

      public EventsViewModel()
      Default constructor for EventsViewModel. Initializes the view model with default repositories for events, signups, facilities, and users.

    • EventsViewModel

      public EventsViewModel(EventRepository eventRepository, SignupRepository signupRepository, UserRepository userRepository, FacilityRepository facilityRepository, androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<User> injectedUserLiveData)
      Parameterized constructor for EventsViewModel for dependency injection.
      Parameters:
      eventRepository - The EventRepository instance.
      signupRepository - The SignupRepository instance.
      userRepository - The UserRepository instance.
      facilityRepository - The FacilityRepository instance.
      injectedUserLiveData - LiveData of the current user, allowing for test injection.
